summary: Tested navigation reorganization and traffic light feature. All features working correctly: 1.1 Find has two sub-items (1.1.1 Via LinkedIn and 1.1.2 Via Google Maps), 1.1.1 Via LinkedIn expands to show 3 items (By Molecules, By Post, By Position), all routes load correctly, traffic light endpoint returns proper status with contacts_this_week, goal, and progress for LinkedIn finders.
passed_tests: Navigation: 1.1 Find has two sub-items: 1.1.1 Via LinkedIn and 1.1.2 Via Google Maps
Navigation: 1.1.1 Via LinkedIn expands to show 3 items: 1.1.1.1 By Molecules, 1.1.1.2 By Post, 1.1.1.3 By Position
Traffic Light: Each LinkedIn item shows contacts_this_week, goal (50), progress
Traffic Light: 1.1.1 Via LinkedIn shows total goal (150) and breakdown by source
Traffic Light: Status logic correct - green >= 50, yellow > 0, red = 0
Auto-expand: Navigation auto-expands to show active route correctly
context_for_next_testing_agent: Navigation reorganization complete. 1.1 Find now has 3 levels of nesting: 1.1 Find > 1.1.1 Via LinkedIn > 1.1.1.1-3 (Molecules/Post/Position). Traffic light logic for LinkedIn finders: Green >= 50 contacts/week, Yellow > 0 but < 50, Red = 0. Parent 1.1.1 Via LinkedIn has goal of 150 (50 x 3) with breakdown by source.
